faq.question: What are the opening hours of Barbeque Nation in Delhi?
faq.answer: Barbeque Nation Delhi is open from 12:00 PM to 3:30 PM for lunch and 6:30 PM to 11:00 PM for dinner, seven days a week.

faq.question: What is the price of the buffet at Barbeque Nation Delhi?
faq.answer: The buffet at Barbeque Nation Delhi costs ₹799 per person (plus taxes) for lunch on weekdays, ₹899 for lunch on weekends, and ₹999 for dinner every day. Children between 4-8 years are charged at 60% of the adult price.

faq.question: Where is Barbeque Nation located in Delhi?
faq.answer: Barbeque Nation has multiple outlets in Delhi. Our main branches are at: 1) Connaught Place - N-79, Outer Circle, 2) Janakpuri - 3rd Floor, Unity One Mall, 3) Saket - 3rd Floor, Select Citywalk Mall, 4) Vasant Kunj - Ground Floor, Ambience Mall.

faq.question: Do I need to make a reservation at Barbeque Nation Delhi?
faq.answer: While walk-ins are welcome, we recommend making a reservation, especially for weekends and holidays, to avoid waiting. You can book a table through our website, mobile app, or by calling the restaurant directly.

faq.question: Is there a vegetarian menu at Barbeque Nation Delhi?
faq.answer: Yes, Barbeque Nation Delhi offers an extensive vegetarian menu with a variety of starters, main courses, and desserts. We have separate grilling stations for vegetarian and non-vegetarian items.

faq.question: What special offers are available at Barbeque Nation Delhi?
faq.answer: We offer a 15% discount for lunch on weekdays, special rates for birthday celebrations, and a 10% discount for senior citizens. We also have seasonal festivals with special menus throughout the year.

booking.details: To book a table at any of our Delhi outlets, please provide the following information: 1) Preferred date and time, 2) Number of guests, 3) Contact number, 4) Special requests if any. Our Delhi outlets can accommodate groups of up to 40 people with prior reservation.
Connaught Place: 120 seats, Janakpuri: 90 seats, Saket: 110 seats, Vasant Kunj: 100 seats. For large group bookings (more than 15 people), please book at least 2 days in advance.

We can arrange special decorations for birthday and anniversary celebrations with 24 hours notice. Please mention your requirements while booking. A cake cutting charge of ₹250 applies if you bring your own cake.
